tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cloud_spending_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    total_cost DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE cost_analysis_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    spending_category VARCHAR(255),
    amount_spent DECIMAL(10,2),
    date_of_analysis DATE
)

CREATE TABLE visualization_data (
    visualization_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id UUID,
    chart_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_source TEXT,
    visualization_image BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE cloud_spending (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    category VARCHAR,
    amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE cost_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    resource_name VARCHAR,
    cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE visualization_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    chart_type VARCHAR,
    data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE report_summary (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    report_name VARCHAR,
    summary TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE visualization_data (
  visualization_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT REFERENCES reports(report_id),
  user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
  visualization_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  visualization_data JSONB
);
